userreviews.userReview: This was just a pleasure to read.As a longtime reader of Nalini Singh (I have read all of her series in full, with the exception of Noah's Rock book), reading this was like hanging out with old friends. I did skip over two of them (Lara & Walker's story and Max's story) because I am just plain uninterested in those couples for some reason, but otherwise I read and enjoyed each short. For those interested, this was a download Nalini offered free via her monthly newsletter, to which I am a subscriber.
Loved all the short stories.

What a wonderful gift to the fans!I love that all her free short stories and scenes from Guild Hunter, Psy-Changeling and Rock Hard series that were published at least through December 2017 were brought together in this one volume. Lovely peek-ins with favorite characters.
My favourite short stories from Nalini Singh's newsletter in one bundle.Perfect!

I was surprised when I realized I'd caught all these shorts in Nalini Singh's newletters (honestly, I figured with my attention span I *must* have missed one or two), but it was still a treat to get to read them all again. I have some seriously mad love for Nalini Singh's writing and would GLADLY go back and read anything she puts out more than once. *thumbs up*-Kelly @ Reading the Paranormal

This is a collection of all the free short stories Singh has written and released, either on her website or another one. It includes stories that have been harder to find, both in the Guild Hunter universe as well as the Psy-Changeling one. If anyone wants to have access to this collection, simply sign up for her newsletter, and you'll be able to download this for free.

I only read the Psy-Changeling short stories as I haven’t finished reading the Guild Hunter books and I haven’t even started the Rock Kiss books. So I’d rather read those series first and then read the short stories. All of these short stories apart from maybe 3, I had read before via the newsletter and on her website, so it was nice re-reading it all in one collection. As always, I’m obsessed with this world. My obsession is actually unreal (help, don’t know what to do now that there’s no new books to read). So of course I had to give it 5 stars. It’s just lovely catching up with all the characters we know and love, and having this mini insight in their lives :) As always, these characters melt my heart ❣
I have read almost all this little stories in Nalini's newsletter. I wait every month to read the new one. The story about little Illium and Aodham is one of my favorite.

As a thank you to readers in her December 2017 newsletter, Singh has pooled an array of short stories and snippets from her monthly newsletters into a first volume. I am so happy to finally have these stories in one place! I love opening the email to see who may have a snippet and this simply gives me easier access:) Set in her Guild Hunter and Psy Changeling worlds, and her Rock series, there’s something for everyone to enjoy. If you haven’t tried her books, these vignettes are also nice introductions to her various worlds.

I’ve read and loved all three of Nalini Singh’s series (Guild Hunter, Psy/Changling, and Rock Hard), and have enjoyed some of these short stories in her newsletters. So glad she compiled them all together for her readers. Loved all of the quiet (and sometimes funny) moments she put together for her characters throughout the different series! I also loved that she included where the stories take place in the storylines.

This a compilation of short stories and newsletters from Singh that include her Guild Hunter, Psy-Changeling and Rock series. It's those quiet, intense, laugh out loud, lovable moments of brief glimpses into the very lives we have read about. It was absolutely pleasurable, adorable and loving to witness these characters as they grew into themselves and each other. Loved it!!! 5 stars!!!

I always love the glimpses into the lives of her characters that Nalini gives us in these short stories. To put them all in one book is just genius!While you can I think read some of them without haven read the particular series you get more out of it if you have read the series.It's so long to wait for the release of her next book so this was a nice gift.

I've read most of these before, but it was nice to have them gathered into a single volume. I loved the ones from the Psy-Changeling series and from the Guild Hunter series. Skipped the Rock series, as those books don't interest me.
Love returning to her worlds.
Thank You very much Ms SinghIt's so very nice to get these little tidbits of life with the Guild Hunters and the Psy-Changelings. Can't wait for the next book.Thanks againKen

This a sweet treat for anyone who is a fan of any of Nalini's series. Included are short stories from the Psy-Changeling, Guild Hunter, and Rock Kiss series! Loved it. Highly recommend. Some come from the monthly newsletters Nalini sends out but some are new! It was great to read them all bound in one volume. (Note: Any book with Kaleb gets all the stars in the sky haha)

description: Exclusive Extra: Newsletter Exclusives E-BookThis exclusive collection of short stories is set in three of Nalini Singh's worlds:Psy-Changeling: A world inhabited by Psy, who have phenomenal powers of the mind, but are forbidden to feel emotion; changelings who can shift into wolves and leopards and more, and who are as wild and emotional as the Psy are cold; and humans, caught between the two powerful races but with an important role to play in the world.Guild Hunter: A dark, dangerous world ruled by archangels as cruel as they are beautiful, with vampires as their servants, and human guild hunters trained to bring home vampires who seek to break their contracts with the archangels.Rock Kiss: A contemporary rock and roll world featuring the band Schoolboy Choir.These are slices of life that show us glimpses of the characters and worlds away from the main storylines, a peek through the curtain of their ongoing lives. (Put together for Nalini's fans, a number of the stories do stand alone if you'd like to try her worlds).Note from NaliniI've written many short stories for you over the years, so many in fact that not every reader has managed to read every story. They've been scattered over multiple newsletters and the website.When we began to put them together into a single file, we discovered the stories came to roughly 275 pages. Forty-one different stories in the Psy-Changeling, Guild Hunter, and Rock Kiss worlds.While I was checking the file, I ended up reading some of the stories and they left me with a smile on my face. I hope you enjoy the collection just as much, and that you now have an easy way to read your favorites - and if you've missed a story, it should be in there.If it isn't, I'm sure it'll make it's way into the next volume in another few years time. Also, we didn't include the deleted scenes in this volume, as the collection was already a big one. They may turn up as a surprise another year. :-)
